description: This file defines a React functional component called Pagination used for navigating through pages in a user interface, displaying 'Prev' and 'Next' buttons along with current page information.

methods.name: Pagination({ page, totalPages, onChange })
methods.description: React functional component for pagination controls

ctags.name: Pagination
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Pagination({ page, totalPages, onChange }) {$/
